title: Costs $12?
body: As the title says, this app costed me $12 to buy, shouldnt it be free? and when getting it from the iphone store why did it say 'get' and not '$11.99'

replies.body:
Our app is totally free (and says "Get")! 

Could you please link me to what you downloaded if you paid for the app? That should not be happening. :( 

This is our official app link if anyone needs it: https://itunes.apple.com/app/league-friends/id1077150310?ls=1&mt=8
Where did you see this? I'm pretty sure it's absolutely free.
